name: Toon Tanks (itch) (Calae)
description:
Hello! My name is Calae and I am learning UE5. I am following a course on GameDev.tv, linked here. This is the fourth finished project out of five. I decided to make a couple small additions to the game myself. These include a second, bigger turret and a health bar.

In this game, you control a blue tank who is fighting against the red turrets! Can you destroy all of the turrets before they destroy you?

Controls are as follows:

  • W: Move forward
  • S: Move backward
  • A: Turn left
  • D: Turn right
  • Mouse: Aim turret toward the cursor location
  • Left Click: Fire turret
  • R: Restart game
  • Escape: Quit game

Good luck soldier!
